title: How to download music on a MacBook Air - Quora

response.answer_text: Apple makes it easy for users to listen to music on their devices. You should join Apple Music; a service that gives you access to millions of music files. It’s a subscription service that costs $9.99 per month. You can download files directly from the app. Plus, the iTunes store still lives. It’s in the Apple Music app. Even if you’re not subscribed to that service, you can still download music. Of course; you’ll have to pay for it. But when people ask how to download music on a MacBook, they usually seek free alternatives. Here are my suggestions: Explore Jamendo and Soundcloud. These are free services, which feature music that was made available by artists. Both services are completely legit.You can use a file converter, which turns YouTube videos into downloadable music files. That’s in the “grey” area so I won’t give you direct instructions. But you can search the web and you’ll easily find out how it works.
